main event: A red to orange object, slightly larger than a baseball, exhibited rapid movements and hovered in the air before disappearing when approached by police.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 1000 ft altitude,It moved erratically up, down, sideways and hovered,Upon the approach of the police, the object rapidly moved west,Police lost radio contact with Jamestown, S.D. when close to the object,All radio contact was regained after the object left the area.
